content.title: Viranarayan Singh Shram Ann Yojana
content.details: Labor Department of Chhattisgarh State started this scheme 'Viranarayan Singh Shram Ann Yojana' for unorganized worker on 17 January 2018. The main objective of the scheme to provide the food assistance for unorganized worker at their work places.
benefits: Hot food is being distributed to construction workers at â‚¹ 5/- in food centers.
Cooked rice, dal, vegetable or khichdi, fai dal, vegetable or cumin rice, fried dal, vegetable.
Pickles will also be payable along with the food.
eligibility: Registered unorganized workers are eligible for benefits.
content.application_process: Offline. There is no need to apply to avail the benefits. Beneficiaries can avail benefits by visiting their nearest food distribution center.

faqs.question: What is this scheme?
faqs.answer: Chhattisgarh state Government started a scheme 'Viranarayan Singh Shram Ann Yojana' for unorganized worker on 17 January 2018.

faqs.question: What is the objective of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The main objective of the scheme to provide the food assistance for unorganized worker at nearest food distribution center.

faqs.question: Who can get the benefits?
faqs.answer: All eligible registered unorganized labor individuals from Chhattisgarh State.

faqs.question: Can applicant get the benefits multiple times?
What is the eligible age to get the benefits?
faqs.answer: There is no age restriction for the scheme.

faqs.question: What is the procedure to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: There is no need to apply for the scheme. Beneficiaries will get the benefits at their nearest food centers.

faqs.question: What documents are required for the scheme?
faqs.answer: 1. Aadhaar Card. 2. Permanent residence certificate. 3. Registration Card
